product_name: Estee LauderRevitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Cream SPF 25 Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingFlex, firm, protect - take your skin higher with Estée Lauder's indulgent, broad spectrum SPF 25 multi-action Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme SPF 25 Moisturizer to reveal a more lifted look.
details: DetailsBenefitsSee a more lifted look, and firmness, strength and radiance. All in a supremely indulgent texture.Lines and wrinkles look reduced. Firmness and elasticity are significantly improved.Skin glows with a new healthy looking vitality. And is stronger, radiant, deeply nourished and hydrated - empowered to reveal its youth potential. Live uplifted.PHOTOAGING PROTECTION: BROAD SPECTRUM UVA/UVB SUNSCREENThis anti-aging moisturizer with SPF 25 and anti-oxidants helps defend skin against the damaging effects of UVA/UVB rays and other environmental damage.Why use a moisturizer with SPF? Protecting your skin with a broad spectrum sunscreen helps prevent early skin aging - including lines, wrinkles, discolorations and loss of firmness - caused by the sun.Key IngredientsYOUTH POWER INGREDIENTSCollagen Boosting TechnologyEstée Lauder's formula combines their nature-powered ingredients with their Collagen Boosting Technology, to help reignite skin's power to help skin feel firmer, look more lifted.Exclusive Hibiscus Morning Bloom ExtractNature at its most powerful. Estée Lauder scientists discovered that Hibiscus sinensis flowers harvested early in the day hold the highest "youth power" activity.So they gather hand-selected blooms in the morning for peak potency, then - in a process that takes 83 days from harvest to manufacture - create our powerful extract that helps firm and lift the look of skin.Exclusive Moringa ExtractOften referred to as the "miracle tree," Moringa is one of the most effective Youth Power ingredients they've ever discovered. Their extract, created through an exclusive, patent-pending process, helps skin empower multiple anti-aging pathways.Cactus Stem Cell Extract and Hyaluronic AcidAdditional high-performance ingredients add to the power of Revitalizing Supreme+. An infusion of Cactus Stem Cell Extract and Hyaluronic Acid helps reveal stronger, nourished skin, saturated with 72-hour hydration. Skin's vital moisture barrier is strengthened.Research ResultsClinical testing showed:-31% reduction in the look of neck lines(A)-22% line reduction(A)+22% smoothness(A)-15% pore reduction(B)Women who tried it were convinced:94% said skin felt stronger(C)94% said skin's elasticity and bounce improved(D)90% said skin looked more even toned(C)89% said skin looked more lifted(D)Lightweight, silky-soft and nourishing. Oil-free. Absorbs quickly.95% said it penetrated and melted deeply into skin(E)92% said it left skin residue-free(E)For all ages and skintypes. Proven results for women 40+.(A) Clinical testing on 50 women after using product for 12 weeks.(B) Clinical testing on 54 women, after using product for 12 weeks.(C) Consumer testing on 131 women after using product for 2 weeks.(D) Consumer testing on 131 women after using product for 4 weeks.(E) Consumer testing on 131 women after using product for 1 week.Item 2618891How To UseApply all over face and neck, AM and PM. Ideal after your repair serum. Avoid eye area.IngredientsAvobenzone 3%, Homosalate 7%, Octisalate 4.5%, Octocrylene 6%Ingredients: Water\Aqua\Eau, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Glycerin, Dibutyl Adipate, Dextrin Palmitate, Silica, Cetyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Myristyl Myristate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Hibiscus Sinensis Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Whey Protein\Lactis Protein\Protéine Du Petit-Lait, Opuntia Tuna Extract, Acetyl Glucosamine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Algae Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Silybum Marianum (Lady'S Thistle) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Caffeine, Hordeum Vulgare Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Sodium Lactate, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Sucrose, Sodium Pca, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Hexylene Glycol, Steareth-21, Disodium Edta, Dimethicone, Trisiloxane, Myristyl Laurate, C13-15 Alkane, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Heptyl Undecylenate, Isoceteth-20, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Isohexadecane, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Bht, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Benzoate, Red 4 (Ci 14700), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply all over face and neck, AM and PM. Ideal after your repair serum. Avoid eye area.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: used all weekend for sun block on my face and it was great.

reviews.headline: Good cream
reviews.comments: I love this cream, is perfect for protection in sunny days and my skin feels more moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Best of the best
reviews.comments: Leaves my face feeling amazingly soft every time!!! Definitely worth the money!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I have a strong appreciation for this cream, having used it for the past five years, and I intend to keep using it. It does not cause any irritation and is suitable for use in any weather conditions. Its texture is quite pleasant, and I would definitely recommend it to others.

reviews.headline: It doesn't absorb
reviews.comments: This moisturizer did not absorb in to my skin and after a couple hours my skin felt dry and tight. It left a layer of cream just sitting on top of my skin. For the price, my skin should be at the very least moisturized

reviews.headline: This product includes fragrance
reviews.comments: Fragrance is not good for the face, especially for skin of color. Fragrance is one of the leading causes of contact dermititis. It is otherwise a grear profuct, they just need to refomulate & remove the fragrance!

reviews.headline: Amazing moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is my first time using an Ester Lauder product and I'm really impressed. I never write reviews but honestly the improvement in my skin's uneven tone/hyperpigmentation and fine lines- especially on my neck, have  improved considerably.  I've been using for about 3 weeks now. It is a bit pricey but a little goes a long way with this moisturizer. Finally a product that lives up to what it claims to do!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was recently gifted this Estee Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme SPF 25 Moisturizer in exchange for an honest review. I want to start off by saying I have been a regular user of Estee Lauder skincare products and am quite happy with their product line. 
I was excited to try this new product. Plus for having the SPF 25. I'm 35 so I am actively working on anti aging and wrinkle reducers.  So I put this on after I cleansed and toned in the morning. The packaging is nice. It looks luxurious and it feels the same as well. Love the scent and feel of it on my face. I also applied it to my neck area, anywhere that would get sun exposure. I then continued on with my makeup. I like that there's no whitecast. Obviously this is for daytime use only so this amount can last you quite a bit of time. It's also oil free which also helps it not feel "sticky" which I hate. The moringa extract as an ingredient is interesting to me. I think it's the first product I've used that contains that! But I've heard good things regarding antioxidants and what not. I will continue using this in my morning routine. She's a keeper.
Gifted by esteelauder
faceoff_positive.headline: Luxe day cream for my morning routine

faceoff_negative.comments:
I recently tried the Estée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme with SPF 25, but ultimately, I decided it wasn't the right fit for my skincare regimen. While the cream itself is pleasant to use, with a luxurious feel that Estée Lauder is known for, I didn't find it meeting all my specific needs.

In terms of benefits, I did notice some firmness in my facial skin after use, which speaks to the product's quality and effectiveness in some areas. However, the main issue I was hoping to address - reducing the appearance of neck lines, partly due to PCOS - saw no noticeable improvement. This was a bit disappointing, given my high hopes for such a reputable brand.

I chose to stop using the product as it didn't align well with my skincare goals. However, recognizing its potential benefits for other skin concerns, I passed it on to my mom. Her skin concerns align more closely with what this moisturizer promises to tackle, and I believe it will be a better match for her needs.

While this moisturizer may not have been a perfect match for me, it could certainly be a valuable addition to someone else's skincare routine, especially for those looking to improve skin firmness and enjoy the added protection of SPF. * gifted by Estée Lauder *
faceoff_negative.headline: Product not for me but definitely worked for my mom ❤️
